Description: Specifies [additional command line options](https://mariadb.com/kb/en/mariadbd-options/) that are not otherwise set by AMP. Use with care. Alternatively, specify the equivalent under "Options File Settings"

Specifies [options file settings](https://mariadb.com/kb/en/configuring-mariadb-with-option-files/) to include in 'my.cnf' that are not otherwise set by AMP. One setting per line, including the option group heading
